akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of trout hatchery in Pisgah National Forest

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 760–3. Establishment of trout hatchery in Pisgah National Forest The Secretary of the Interior, after consulting with the Secretary of Agriculture, shall establish, construct, equip, operate, and maintain a trout hatchery at an appropriate location on the Davidson River in the Pisgah National Forest, North Carolina. (June 18, 1956, ch. 404, § 1, 70 Stat. 292.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries AppropriationsSection 2 of act June 18, 1956, authorized the appropriation of $375,000 to carry out the purposes of this section.
